data.text:
FAMILY CIRCLE

SKINNER, Cornelia Otis

Boston: Houghton Mifflin Co., 1948. Illustrated. Item #43013

SKINNER, Cornelia Otis. FAMILY CIRCLE. Illustrated with photographs. Boston: Houghton Mifflin Co., 1948. 8vo., cloth in dust. First Edition. Typed letter signed from Skinner laid in: "October 8, 1948. Dear Isaac: What a darling letter and how sweet of you to write me. I am so proud that you liked the book about those two people who were so fond of you. They would both have been very proud to know that you approved of their child's effort. Affectionate greetings to you both, Cornelia." Very Good (moderate soil covers); little wear & short tears (bit of fading spine) d/j. $50.00.
